translations: n.阉（公）鸡（尤指养肥供食用的）；女人气的男人；男同性恋者
n.（Capon）人名；（英）卡彭；（法、西、意、罗）卡蓬

phrs.translation: 阉鸡, 被阉过的公鸡, 最大似然, 结合配体
焖油鸡配菜, 详细翻译
馆长卡彭, 埃德蒙·卡彭

sentences.sentence: In fair round belly, with good capon lined.
The capon burns, and the pig falls from the spit, and the meal will BE all cold if you do not come home.
sentences.translation: 您要是再不回去，鸡就烧糊啦，猪肉就从烤叉上掉下来啦，饭也要全凉啦！

sentences.sentence: I still remember how funny I looked theway I was dressed - in a blue cloth gown with a short sleeveless jacket over it and a skull capon the head.
sentences.translation: 我记得那时我的打扮挺滑稽的，穿着蓝布大褂、小坎肩，戴瓜皮小帽。
